translation.en: I mean you were being a brat and he was trying to be a stand-up guy.
translation.ja: 子供っぽいのは お前さんだ

translation.en: Good Lord, woman--
Sometimes, I think you're going to be my best and only friend forever.
translation.ja: モモは唯一で最高の友達だよ

translation.en: At least you'll never leave me. Will you, buddy?
translation.ja: ずっと私のそばにいるよね

translation.en: No you won't. Oh, no you won't.
translation.ja: そうだろ？ ああ そうだ

translation.en: You know what, [bleep] that guy. He's dead to me.
translation.ja: あいつはもう必要ないな

translation.en: Oh! What's up, man?
How much did you just hear? Cause I was-- They were just jokes.
translation.ja: いつから聞いてた？ 全部 冗談だぞ

translation.en: [robot] I made you a gift.
The most important parts of me...
are the memories of you.
It hurts when I lose them.
You lost something too.
translation.ja: あなたも 何かを無くした？

translation.en: Listen,
would it help if I promise you I'll never let you down again?
translation.ja: 二度とあなたを がっかりさせません

translation.en: How can you promise something like that?
translation.ja: そんな約束 守れる？

translation.en: People leave and there's nothing you can do about it.
translation.ja: みんな いつかは去っていく

translation.en: I don't know. You're probably right.
I do know I don't want to lose you.
translation.ja: でも 僕はずっと一緒がいい

translation.en: Then, maybe...
don't lose me.
Mai, if I lost you, I'd be lost too.
translation.ja: あなたを失ったら 僕は途方に暮れる

translation.en: So...
we cool?
-You got my back? -I do got your back.
translation.ja: 私を守る？ お任せを

translation.en: Then, yeah, we cool.
Oh!
Mom, don't freak out.
Look, I can explain.
I think you'd better get your robot, young lady.
translation.ja: そのロボットを 連れてきなさい

translation.en: -[whirring] -Okay, okay.
Optical CRT intact.
Brachial prismatic joints are fine.
Motor responses...
This is where you removed your memory storage unit.
Uh-huh. I'm broken.
Don't worry. I can fix it.
This chip contains a full system restore point.
translation.ja: このチップで すべて復元できる

translation.en: A disc image from when I first created you. Run this and you'll be like new again. A fresh start.
translation.ja: 初期と同じ状態になって 新品同様になるぞ

translation.en: Wait, a fresh start?
Does that mean I lose my memories?
-Woah, hands off hippy! -Mai, don't be cute.
translation.ja: ねえ 手を放しな やめなさい

translation.en: -Want to tell me what this is all about? -This is Dr. Rice, Mai,
translation.ja: どういうこと？ この人はライス博士

translation.en: and that's his Q-Bot.
No, no. This isn't a Q-Bot. This is-- He is...
translation.ja: これはＱボットじゃない 彼は特別なんだ 目的があって作られた

translation.en: something special. He has a purpose.
translation.ja: 彼は特別なんだ 目的があって作られた

translation.en: [Q-Bot] Oh, I didn't know we were expecting company.
translation.ja: お客様が来てたんですね

translation.en: -Can I offer you a lava ca-- -[electric shock]
translation.ja: スイーツはいかがです…

translation.en: Woah, what are you doing?
-Sorry, listen-- -[Q-Bot] Sandlewood.
Listen, something terrible is about to happen.
7723 is our only hope stopping it. I designed him to stop it.
translation.ja: それを防げるのが 私の作った この7723だけ

translation.en: -I get it. He's a weapon. -What?
-Why would you put weapons in a robot? -Because it's awesome.
translation.ja: ロボットに武器を？ カッコいいよ

translation.en: Awesome indeed.
I'm sorry, is now a bad time?
I mean, should I come back? I could always come back.
translation.ja: また今度にしてもいい

translation.en: -Who is this? How'd you get in here? -Justin Pin?
translation.ja: どうやって入った？ ピンさん？

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I'm a huge fan, I'm your biggest fan.
translation.ja: あなたの大ファンなんです

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm a huge fan of you!
Ah, Dr, Tanner Rice here, really should be more careful with this secret project.
translation.ja: 極秘のプロジェクトを バラしちゃいかんだろ

translation.en: -Well this has been really great but-- -Justin.
translation.ja: ではこれで… ジャスティン

translation.en: My old friend. If you're in there, please hear me.
translation.ja: 私の知る君は まだそこにいるか？

translation.en: Don't you remember the old days?
Come on. Dude, it was so awesome! I mean, building robots for the people.
translation.ja: あの頃は 人々のために ロボットを作った

translation.en: Before Ares. Before all of this.
-[Q-Bot] Foot rub later? -[Dr. Rice] Come on. This isn't us.
translation.ja: マッサージ？ こんなの我々らしくない

translation.en: Seriously, when did making the world a better place become killing people?
translation.ja: いつから目的が 殺人に変わったんだ？

translation.en: I actually think "killing people" is making the world a better place.
translation.ja: より良い世界を築くのに 必要なことだ

translation.en: But I'm glad that we have this out in the open. Secrets hurt after all, right?

translation.en: I think he wants to kill us.
Oh, no, no. Not you per say, but just people in general.
translation.ja: まさか　君たちだけじゃない 人類全体をだ

translation.en: I want to kill them, all of them. Most of them.
translation.ja: ほとんどの人類を殺す

translation.en: Whatever. Look, don't worry. Once it gets rolling, thinks will be happening really quickly.
translation.ja: 計画が始まれば あっという間に終わるさ

translation.en: Boom, boom, boom. Trust me, it will be fine.
-Justin Pin's a bad guy? -That explains a lot actually.
translation.ja: ピンが悪党なの？ これで納得だよ

translation.en: But he's messing with the wrong cute little robot.
translation.ja: でも相手が悪かったね

translation.en: -Blast them! -I'm sorry, Mai. But I can't.
translation.ja: やっちゃえ できないんです

translation.en: -What? -I--
-[swoosh] -[Molly] Mai, what is going on here?
You know what? That is a great question.
What is he doing?
[Mai] Use your guns! Use your plasma thingy.
Get back, it's not safe.
-Uh-oh. -Okay, fine.
Whose dog is this?
[Q-Bot] Hey, guys.
Did he just explode? We gotta go back, we gotta get mom.
translation.ja: 爆発した？ ママを助けないと

translation.en: -Mai! -Mom.
translation.ja: いや ママ　待って
ママ　待って 放してよ

translation.en: -[army robot] Surround the target. -Why aren't you stopping to help her?
translation.ja: 包囲した ママを助けに行ってよ

translation.en: No!
No!
Wow, what a scuffle. It looks--
translation.ja: すごい乱闘でしたね まるで…

translation.en: Put me down! Stop, just stop!
translation.ja: ちょっと　止まってよ

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
They took my mom!
I'm sorry, I couldn't stop them.
translation.ja: 防げなくてすみません

translation.en: This is how you got my back?
I thought you were some kind of superhero.
translation.ja: あんたはヒーローだと 思ってた

translation.en: But you just stood by and let them take her.
translation.ja: あんたはヒーローだと 思ってた なのに さらわれるのを 黙って見てた

translation.en: -You let them. -I didn't let them.
translation.ja: なのに さらわれるのを 黙って見てた 違います

translation.en: I had nothing to fight them with.
-What? -I deleted my weapon control systems.
translation.ja: え？ 武器を削除したんです

translation.en: What? Why would you do that?
Because I was out of memory.
There was nothing I could delete that wasn't you.
translation.ja: あなた以外の記憶は 他になかった

translation.en: Okay, so your precious robot memories
translation.ja: つまり あんたの 大切な思い出が―

translation.en: are more important than my mother's life? Is that it?
translation.ja: ママの命よりも 大事だってこと？ そうなの？

translation.en: Is that what you're saying?
I hope that's not what you're saying.
I know I messed up,
but I had no choice. I had to save you.
translation.ja: でもあなたを守りたかった

translation.en: I can't lose you, Mai.
My parents are gone.
translation.ja: 両親ともいなくなった

translation.en: The second I believe this thing between us is real
translation.ja: あんたのこと 信じ始めてたのに―

translation.en: you burn it down to the ground like everyone else does!
translation.ja: 結局は他の人たちと一緒ね

translation.en: Look, remember this.
I'm bailing first.
You okay, kiddo?
-I have you now, princess. -No!
translation.ja: 見つけましたよ やめて　放してよ

translation.en: -Get your hands off me. -Okay, come on--

translation.en: Mai, don't do this by yourself.
-I don't need you. -Come on. Just listen to me.
translation.ja: 平気よ 聞いてください

translation.en: Hi, you are in violation--
-Please stop fighting me. -[robot] Huh.
Mai, I'm trying to help.
[sarcastically] Oh, good! Weapons would help. Did you bring any weapons this time?
translation.ja: だったら 今回は武器が使えるのよね？

translation.en: -It doesn't work like that. -I don't know about you,
translation.ja: 無理です ロケットランチャーがあれば 楽勝なんだけど

translation.en: but a rocket launcher would make me feel a whole lot better.
translation.ja: ロケットランチャーがあれば 楽勝なんだけど

translation.ja: 武器を復元したら 記憶がすべて消去され

translation.en: I'd forget everything I've ever learned.
[sarcastically] Oh, real tragedy.
-I wouldn't know who to fight anymore. -Whatever, I can fight alone.

translation.en: -I've been doing it my whole life. -You are not alone!

You're right. I let you down.

translation.en: A lot of people let you down, but you are not alone.

[7723] Nowhere else.
I miss him.
Everyday.
And everyday, I'm mad at him for leaving.

Quite a team we make-- A broken robot and a broken little girl.

translation.en: It's more than I could have ever asked for.

translation.en: -You know that, don't you? -Oh, yeah for sure.

-[7723] Let's go. Come on. -[sirens wailing]
-Momo! -What?
Alert. Alert.
-Hold up! You guys hear that? -[indistinct conversation in distance]
-Momo, shh! -[7723] Wait.
-[Momo] She's that way! -Momo said she's this way, come on.

"Momo says?"
I don't need that. I have a copy of that.
All right, maybe I can try that. Where did I see--

Hey, hey! Guys, wait. Oh, goodness.

Ignore that, that's a trap.
-There's no way I'll ignore that. -No, listen.

translation.en: We can save your mother.

translation.en: We can save everybody, but we have to stop Ares to do it.

translation.en: No, you don't understand. It's not Pin.

I mean he...
He lost all patience for tedious backstory?

translation.en: Yeah? [laughs]
These guys again?
I think that's just about enough, Dr. Tanner Rice.

Oh, right. The human woman. Oh my gosh.

What do you mean human woman?
What? What do you mean, what do I mean?
I mean, who talks like that?
Normal humans do. [chuckles nervously]
[stuttering] I mean, I do. Because I do normal human things
translation.ja: 私みたいな 普通の人間なら言うさ

translation.en: all the time. All the time.
Literally, you could ask any other human if I--
You won't get away with this. He can't hide forever.
translation.ja: 永遠には隠しておけないぞ

translation.en: -You know, people will find out-- -[zapping]
-You know what, never mind. -No!
[Mai] No!
[robot, low-pitched voice] Now it's time to finish this.

You said two minutes, it's been two minutes.
Oh, hey Ares.
[Mai] Nope.
-Give me a D! -[blast]
-[man] It's Justin! -[crowd whooping]
[7723] Oh, come on...
Oh, no!
-[robot] So, then I go back and get him-- -[Mai] Go get the cops!

translation.en: But Dr. Rice is dead. I have to take some time to process this.

translation.en: Okay, get the cops. Get the cops.

translation.en: Mom!
Momo, come on!
-[muffled] -Mom, are you okay?
Oh, Mai. My baby!
-Mom-- -I'm so sorry. I should've paid more attention. You felt so all alone.
translation.ja: あなたの気持ちに 気付けなくてごめんね

translation.en: I should've given you a hug, but I was alone too

translation.en: and thought robots were my answer. But you're my answer!

translation.en: I hope that I'm your answer. You were so right and I was wrong.
translation.ja: 本当はあなたと 向き合うべきだった

translation.en: I love you so, so much!
Wow, yeah. I love you too.
But listen, Pin wants to kill all these people you need to help me get them out of here.

translation.en: They're never going to believe you.
I am a beloved public figure.
And they do whatever I want them to.

translation.en: [echoing over P.A.] These morons are lining up to pay for the bombs
translation.ja: バカどもは喜んで 爆弾にカネを払ってる

translation.en: I'm going to use to kill-- Hold on, wait a second.
translation.ja: 殺されるとも知らず… 何だこれは

Am I hearing an echo?
Hello. Do you guys hear that? Can anyone else hear an echo?
translation.ja: もしもし 反響してるよな？

translation.en: Give me that!
[Mai] All of you, listen, now!
translation.ja: 〝生中継〞 みなさん 聞いて 〝生中継〞

translation.en: The Q-Bots are bombs!
Head for the exits. Why is no one running?
translation.ja: ここから逃げて ほら 急いで

translation.en: Run, right now! Get away while you can!
translation.ja: 早く走って　今のうちよ

translation.en: Ah! You. Are. A. Mean. Puppet!
translation.ja: あんたってホントに悪党だ！

translation.en: Oh, why did you do that? [low-pitched] I'm just trying to help!
translation.ja: 良かれと思ってやってるのに

translation.en: No, no!
Okay, fine! I killed Justin Pin and stole his body.
translation.ja: ジャスティン･ピンを殺して 体を奪ったんだよ

translation.en: [Justin and Ares voices in unison] "Boo-hoo!" Shut up!
translation.ja: ブーイングか 黙れ！

translation.en: The guy's dead. Get over it!
translation.ja: 彼は死んだ　受け入れろ

translation.en: You know what he said to me? "You're perfect," he said.
translation.ja: ピンに言われた “お前は完璧だ”と

translation.en: "Now go make the world perfect."
translation.ja: だから世界も完璧にする

translation.en: You want the world to be a better place? You humans are what's wrong with it.
translation.ja: より良い世界のためには 人間が邪魔なんだ

translation.en: -You're flawed and you're broken. -Keep talking, crazy pants.
translation.ja: お前らは不完全だ 続けて

translation.en: [Justin] The only way this world gets perfect...

translation.en: is with all of you dead!
translation.ja: 全人類を殺すしかない

translation.en: Maybe I'll start with killing this one?
translation.ja: 手始めに こいつだ

translation.en: Get your hands off of her!
Put your [bleep] finger on my daughter--
translation.ja: その汚い指で娘に触れたら…

translation.en: [Ares] I guess I don't have to wear the man's suit anymore.
translation.ja: もう人間の体は必要ないな

translation.en: Let's just scrub ahead to the everyone dies part, shall we?
translation.ja: 人類の皆殺し計画を実行する

translation.en: Have at it!
Don't leave yet. [zapping]
Oh, snap!
-Momo, come on. -[barks]
-You just lost a very loyal customer! -Okay, Mom.
translation.ja: あんたの製品は もう買わない 行こう

translation.en: [Justin] Every home. Gorgeous.
translation.ja: 一家に一台… 美しい！

translation.en: Oh, my god! Mai, I've never felt so close to you.
translation.ja: あなたとの距離が縮まったわ

translation.en: -Ah! Mai! -Mom!
-[Greenwood] Ah! Stay away, you freaks! -[Mai] Heads up!
[Greenwood] That was amazing!
-Yeah, cool. -Mai, I'm sorry about what happened.
translation.ja: そうだね 悪かったわ

translation.en: Okay? I didn't mean to hurt you or anybody.
translation.ja: 傷つけるつもりはなくて…

translation.en: -And I know you weren't-- -Can we do this later?
translation.ja: 傷つけるつもりはなくて… 今度にして

translation.en: All right, okay.
[Mai] Follow me, it's our last chance!
translation.ja: みんな 私についてきて

translation.en: [man] Look out! Hurry up!
[Mai] Come on!
Ow!
-Mai, what are you doing? Come on! -I'm going back for them.
translation.ja: あんたも行こう 助けに戻らないと

translation.en: Hello, pr-pr-princess.
All right.
You don't have to fight.
It never stops...
and it never fixes anything.
[Ares] You have been ruined by that human child.
translation.ja: 人間の子供といて ヤワになったか

translation.en: Humans are the imperfection I mean to correct.
translation.ja: 人間は不完全だ 私がそれを正す

translation.en: No one is perfect!
[Ares] I am!
[Ares] Don't you get it?
You're as broken as they are.
But my world... My world will be perfect.

translation.en: No more pain, no more conflict.
translation.ja: 痛みも 争いもない世界

translation.en: No more injustice.
No humanity.
You are very evil.
[Ares] Ah, agree to disagree.
Oh, hey. Look what the meat puppet dragged in.
translation.ja: 見ろ　私の操り人形が 絶好調のようだ

translation.en: You are not ruining this for me.
translation.ja: お前に邪魔はさせない

translation.en: Mai!
[Greenwood] Let her go, you weird old dude.

translation.en: -Don't make me kick your butt. -Greenwood, what are you doing?
translation.ja: その子を放しな 痛い目に遭いたい？ グリーンウッド？ 早く逃げて

translation.en: Get out of here, go!
translation.ja: グリーンウッド？ 早く逃げて

translation.en: Ah! Mai!
I am a stupid robot!
[motherboard] Warning, you are about to begin a full system reset.
translation.ja: 警告　システムを リセットしようとしてます

translation.en: All memories will be lost.
translation.ja: 全メモリが削除されます

translation.en: -Are you sure you want to do this? -[7723] Yes.
translation.ja: 実行しますか？ はい

translation.en: [motherboard] Beginning now. Memory deleted.
translation.ja: 開始します メモリを削除し 武器を起動

translation.en: Weapons available.
translation.ja: メモリを削除し 武器を起動

translation.en: [7723] I've got your back.
Holy crab stacks.
-Thank you. -Mai, listen to me.
translation.ja: ありがとう 聞いてください

translation.en: Our memories make us who we are. Don't let the bad ones stop you from making good ones.
translation.ja: つらい思い出があっても いい思い出は作れる

translation.en: [slow-motion] What are you talking about?
[motherboard] Memories deleting.
Weapons restoring.
Are you okay?
Look out!
Your weapons...
[7723] You are amazing. Go make new memories.
translation.ja: いい思い出を 新しく作ってください

translation.en: [Ares] Stop wasting your time.
[Mai] What-- What are you...
No!
[motherboard echoing] Memories deleting.
[motherboard] Full system reset successful, main memory initialized.
translation.ja: システムリセット完了 初期化しました

translation.en: Hey!
Are you there?
Please come back. I'm-I'm sorry, I-I was wrong.
translation.ja: お願い 戻ってきてよ 私が間違ってた

translation.en: Please, please. Don't be gone.
Aw, stop it.
You're going to make me cry.
translation.ja: 泣けてくるじゃないか

translation.en: Not really. [digital stutter] I'm kidding.
translation.ja: 冗談だ　泣くわけない

translation.en: Move aside little human.
No, don't! Stay away from him.
translation.ja: ダメ！　彼に近づかないで

translation.en: No! You do not get to touch him.
translation.ja: 彼には絶対に触らせない

translation.en: [Ares] What is it with you people? It's like you thrive on futility.
translation.ja: 無駄なことばかりして 愚かだな

translation.en: -[gun energizes] -There we go.
Oh, well.
Perfect.
-[Momo barks, growls] -Hey!
What are you--
-Whose dog is this? -[Mai] He's mine!
You stupid robot!
-What? -Don't!
Oh, no!
Mai!
You were trying to tell me and I...
translation.ja: 教えてくれたこと守るよ

translation.en: Those memories were all you had and...
translation.ja: 大事な思い出だったのに―

translation.en: You gave them up, for me.
And I'm sorry.
Just please...
Don't be gone.
Hello. What's your name?
-[sobbing] -[Molly] Oh, honey...
-I can keep this? -You can keep it.
Hey, Momo. This is Momo.
translation.ja: 来たの？ この子はモモ

translation.en: -He's a good guy, okay? -Okay.
translation.ja: とってもいい子よ はい

translation.en: -Hello, Momo. -S'up, buddy?
Hey, sweetie.
How's he doing?
Better.
I think.
No! No, no, no!
It's okay, you're okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　危険はない

translation.en: I've got your back.
"I got your back."
Oh, man.
What? I'm allergic to pollen. Are you judging me?
translation.ja: 花粉症なんだよ バカにすんな

translation.en: -Hey, Mai. You ready? -Oh hey, dude!
translation.ja: メイ　行こう やあ アニ

translation.en: You girls have fun now.
Come on, let's go.
Mai, what are you waiting for? You ready?
translation.ja: メイ 急いで いい？

translation.en: [Momo] It's from generations of inbreeds. My ancestors were wolves, bruh.
translation.ja: 祖先のオオカミの遺伝で 花粉に弱いんだ

translation.en: Come on!
[Greenwood] You can play too, but hurry it up.
-[girl] Bring it. -[boy] I'll be the goalie.
[Ani] Over here.
[Greenwood] You're good, but not as good as me.
-Nice try. -I'm open!
[kid] He's so cool!
translation.ja: 彼ってカッコいいよね

translation.en: -What do you call him? -[Mai] My friend.
translation.ja: 彼ってカッコいいよね 私の友達だもん
